object.name: Mascara Firework
object.description: The newest mascara from Maybelline. It does wonders!

object.name: Matte Lipstick - Ruby Red
object.description: Intensely pigmented matte lipstick in a stunning ruby red shade.

object.name: Pore Minimizing Primer
object.description: Blurs imperfections and minimizes the appearance of pores for a smooth makeup application.

object.name: Stay Matte Liquid Foundation
object.description: Oil-free foundation that delivers full coverage with a matte finish that lasts all day.

object.name: Fit Me Concealer
object.description: Lightweight concealer that camouflages imperfections and dark circles without creasing.

object.name: Translucent Loose Setting Powder
object.description: Ultra-fine setting powder that sets makeup for extended wear without caking or settling into fine lines.

object.name: Cream Contour Kit
object.description: Cream-based contour kit with multiple shades for sculpting and defining facial features.

object.name: Shimmering Skin Perfector Pressed Highlighter
object.description: Highly pigmented highlighter that adds a radiant glow to the skin with a seamless finish.

object.name: Brow Wiz
object.description: Ultra-fine retractable pencil for precise filling and shaping of eyebrows.

object.description: A collection of 12 fiery eyeshadows ranging from warm browns to burnt oranges and rich siennas.

object.name: Lash Sensational Mascara
object.description: Volumizing mascara that captures and coats every lash for a full fan effect.

object.name: Matte Lipstick - Rebel Rose
object.description: Highly-pigmented matte lipstick with a comfortable, long-wearing formula.

object.name: Hydrating Primer
object.description: A moisturizing face primer that preps the skin for makeup application while providing hydration.

object.name: Fit Me Dewy + Smooth Foundation
object.description: Dewy foundation with SPF 18 that hydrates and smoothes skin texture for a luminous finish.

object.name: Radiant Creamy Concealer
object.description: Buildable concealer that corrects, contours, highlights, and perfects for radiant skin.

object.name: Fit Me Matte + Poreless Powder
object.description: Pressed powder that mattifies and sets makeup while blurring pores for a flawless finish.

object.name: Pro Contour Palette
object.description: All-in-one contour palette with six velvety powder shades for sculpting and defining facial features.

object.name: Precisely, My Brow Pencil
object.description: Ultra-fine brow pencil with a spoolie brush for precise filling and shaping of eyebrows.

object.description: An essential eyeshadow palette featuring 14 warm and neutral shades in matte and shimmer finishes.

object.name: Hoola Matte Bronzer
object.description: Award-winning matte bronzer for a natural-looking tan and sculpted contour.

object.name: Born This Way Foundation
object.description: Oil-free foundation infused with coconut water and hyaluronic acid for a natural, radiant finish.

object.name: Mary Lou Manizer
object.description: Mary-Lou might not be innocent, but this shimmer sure is!

object.name: Rimmel The Multi-Tasker Concealer
object.description: Introducing the new long- lasting Multi-Tasker concealer from Rimmel. Conceals blemishes, brightens dark circles and covers to even out skin tone.
